articles.title: Potentially Hazardous Asteroid to pass Earth by a close margin! NASA reveals details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details of an upcoming close encounter with an asteroid that is nearly 500 feet wide! Know its speed, distance of approach, and more, as per the US Space Agency.
